successes.title: New, compact, step-driven vehicle. It's your move!
successes.description: Copenhagen, world cycling capital, is taking a step beyond the bike. Me-Mover â€“ the awesome new way for everyone to ride the city.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! Every contribution brings us closer to our goal. You will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.
CHEERS! Your name, together with other supporters, is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + all above.
#1 VOTE FOR ME-MOVER ELECTRICAL ADD-ON + stay hydrated with the Me-Mover SPORTS BOTTLE + all above.
#3 VOTE FOR  ME-MOVER CARGO ADD-ON + all above.
#2 VOTE FOR QUICK-FOLDING HANDLE ADD-ON (folds your Me-Mover in a moment to a more compact shape) + all above.

GET 10% DISCOUNT FROM ME-MOVER'S ONLINE STORE + stay hydrated with the Me-Mover SPORTS BOTTLE + your name together with other supporters is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + you will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.

EARLY BIRD! Be the first one to receive an exclusive Kickstarter BLACK Edition (first batch) + your name, together with other supporters, is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + you will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.

THE ME-MOVER KICKSTARTER EDITION (first batch) + SELECT COLOR (black, white, blue or red) + your name, together with other supporters, is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + you will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.

THE ME-MOVER KICKSTARTER EDITION (second batch) + SELECT COLOR (black, white, blue or red) + your name, together with other supporters, is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + you will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.

BECOME A ME-MOVER AMBASSADOR! Includes 1 Kickstarter Edition Me-Mover (first batch). You choose your own color from the selection of black, white, blue or red. You will become a Me-Mover affiliate and earn 10% of your Me-Mover sales. You are a valued and integrated part of our design and market development process and you will get access to sales and marketing material + provided with a PORTABLE BAG.

BECOME A ME-MOVER AMBASSADOR! Includes 1 Kickstarter Edition Me-Mover (first batch). You choose your own color from the selection of black, white, blue or red. You will become a Me-Mover affiliate and earn 10% of your Me-Mover sales. You are a valued and integrated part of our design and market development process and you will get access to sales and marketing material + provided with a PORTABLE BAG. Add USD 100 for transport outside US or Denmark.

THE ME-MOVER KICKSTARTER LIMITED EDITION SIGNED BY THE FOUNDER JONAS (second batch, in Hot Orange or Metallic Green color) + your name together with other supporters is printed on the Me-Mover packaging material + you will receive updates on the project and Me-Mover progress.

COME TO COPENHAGEN! Get a full day with the makers and the founder Jonas Eliasson, assemble your Kickstarter Editition Me-Mover with the team and be part of an in-depth Design Workshop. In the evening you will have a guided Copenhagen tour and a nice Scandinavian cuisine personal dinner. Includes: 1 Kickstarter Edition Me-Mover, flight from a US major airport, accomodation for 2 nights in Copenhagen.
